hero.description: We are a deep-tech innovation firm converting complex challenges into scalable, <0>production-ready</0> technology solutions powered by <1>AI, Generative AI, and Agentic Intelligence</1>.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.subtitle: Driving human progress through technological excellence
vision.visionDescription: We identify real-world challenges and transform them into scalable, production-ready technology solutionsâ€”not just demos, but <0>deployable systems</0> that create lasting impact.

mission.subtitle: Our Mission
mission.title: Engineering the Future of <0>Intelligent Systems</0>
mission.description: At Siddhi Dynamics LLP, we believe every complex problem has a technological solution waiting to be built. Our mission is to bridge the gap between cutting-edge AI research and real-world applications, delivering systems that are not just innovative but immediately deployable and scalable.

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Deep learning models and intelligent systems that adapt and evolve to solve complex problems.

genAi.title: Generative AI
genAi.description: Creating new content, designs, and solutions with cutting-edge generative models.

agenticAi.title: Agentic AI
agenticAi.description: Autonomous AI agents that reason, plan, and execute complex multi-step workflows.

automation.title: Intelligent Automation
automation.description: End-to-end automation that transforms operations with precision and reliability.

projects.title: Our Products
projects.subtitle: Building the <0>Future</0>
projects.description: Explore our portfolio of production-ready AI platforms transforming construction, education, property management, and personal automation.

archplan.name: ArchPlan AI
archplan.description: A comprehensive, AI-driven platform designed to digitize and streamline the entire construction lifecycle in India. By connecting homeowners, civil engineers, architects, suppliers, and service providers within a single intelligent workflow, ArchPlan AI reduces project delays and optimizes resource allocation with precision.

nexus.name: Nexus Careers
nexus.tagline: AI-Native Campus Operating System & Recruitment ERP
nexus.description: A full-scale, AI-powered Campus Operating System unifying students, academic institutions, recruiters, and administrators into a single multi-tenant platform. Students interact through a futuristic, gamified portal that tracks skill acquisition, automating the journey from enrollment to employment.

nilayam.name: Nilayam
nilayam.description: A modern SaaS platform designed to simplify and automate the entire rental and property management lifecycle. Property owners access a centralized command center to manage properties, generate legally compliant leases instantly, and automate rent collection, ensuring a frictionless experience for both landlords and tenants.

wish0.name: Wish-0
wish0.description: An AI-powered automation system designed to deliver personalized wishes for birthdays and all major life occasions without manual intervention. Wish-0 learns relationship dynamics to craft contextually relevant messages, ensuring you never miss a moment to connect with your loved ones.

letusknow.name: Letusknow
letusknow.description: A revolutionary citizen-centric digital governance platform designed to simplify how people access government services, understand procedures, and resolve public and personal issues. Letusknow bridges the gap between the administration and the public, fostering transparency and efficient grievance redressal.

mission.title: Why Was It Built?
mission.description: To solve widespread inefficiencies, communication gaps, and lack of engagement in traditional campus recruitment. It replaces fragmented systems with a single, intelligent platform connecting Students, Administrators, and Corporate Recruiters.

student.title: For Students
student.problem: Chaotic job search, lack of preparation, difficulty tracking applications, and feeling disconnected from career services.

solution.gamification: Transforms career prep into an engaging game. XP, Levels, and Daily Quests encourage proactive participation.
solution.guidance: AI Career Toolkit acts as a personal coach: Resume Analysis, Cold Email Generation, Skill Gap Analysis, and Mock Interviews.
solution.tracking: 'My Opportunities' dashboard tracks applications from 'Applied' to 'Hired'.
solution.ecosystem: Nexus Gigs for peer services and 'I'm Here' Help for real-time campus assistance.

admin.title: For Administrators
admin.problem: Tedious manual data management, inability to track student performance effectively, and reactive issue handling.

solution.automation: AI Opportunity Importer scrapes job links to save data entry hours. AI generates strategic performance reports.
solution.control: 360-degree view of the placement landscape. Bulk-update student records via Excel uploads.
solution.proactive: Real-time Kanban pipeline for every job drive. AI summarizes common student queries.
solution.department: Department HQ for HODs to manage faculty and circulars.

company.title: For Companies
company.problem: Difficulty reaching talent pools, managing high volumes of applicants, and lack of direct collaboration.

solution.access: Post jobs directly to target college student bodies.
solution.pipeline: Dedicated Candidate Pipeline to track applicants and streamline hiring.
solution.collab: Corporate Teams channel for internal hiring team communication.

student.title: Student Features
items: AI Career Toolkit (Resume, Email, Skill Gap)

admin.title: Administrator Features
items: AI Mentor Lab (Circulars, MoM, Research Papers)

landing.hero_desc: The all-in-one platform for property owners and tenants. Automate leases, streamline payments, and enhance community living with AI-driven insights.
landing.features_title: Everything you need to manage properties
landing.features_desc: Powerful features for both property owners and tenants.

command.title: Command Center
command.desc: Manage your entire portfolio from a single dashboard.

tracking.title: Tenant Tracking
tracking.desc: Monitor tenant history, payments, and requests.

finance.title: Financial Analytics
finance.desc: Real-time insights into revenue and expenses.

predict.title: Predictive Insights
predict.desc: AI-driven market analysis and rent estimation.

portal.title: Personal Portal
portal.desc: Access your lease, documents, and payments anytime.

payments.title: Easy Payments
payments.desc: Secure, one-click rent payments and history.

visual.title: Maintenance Requests
visual.desc: Raise and track maintenance issues with photos.

hero.title: ArchPlan AI
hero.subtitle: From Design to Deployment
hero.desc: Digitizing the fragmented construction ecosystem. We connect homeowners, architects, and engineers with AI-driven tools for 2D/3D planning, Vastu compliance, and real-time cost estimation.

design.title: AI Design Engine
design.desc: Generate regulatory-compliant 2D floor plans and 3D elevations in minutes, not days.

vastu.title: Vastu Guard
vastu.desc: Automated Vastu analysis with instant corrective suggestions for harmonious living.

cost.title: Smart BOQ & Estimation
cost.desc: Real-time Bill of Quantities generation and dynamic material cost estimation.

market.title: Material Marketplace
market.desc: Direct access to verified suppliers for cement, steel, and finishing materials.

hero.title: Let Us Know
hero.subtitle: Bridging Citizens and Government
hero.desc: An all-in-one AI platform that makes official information transparent, accessible, and actionable. Tailored to your village or ward, driven by Google's Gemini AI.

chatbot.title: AI Civic Assistant
chatbot.desc: Ask complex questions like 'How do I apply for a birth certificate?' and get verified, step-by-step answers.

local.title: Hyperlocal Focus
local.desc: Information tailored down to your specific village or ward for maximum relevance.

track.title: Track Development
track.desc: View verified records of government-sanctioned projects, fund releases, and status updates in real-time.

parser.title: AI Document Parser
parser.desc: Upload any government document (PDF/Image) and instantly extract key information into clear records.

report.title: Report Issues
report.desc: Voice your concerns about potholes or water leaks. AI analyzes, summarizes, and routes to the right department.

voice.title: Multi-lingual Voice
voice.desc: Simply speak your issue in your native language, and the app will transcribe and process it for you.

hero.title: Wish-O
hero.subtitle: Never Miss a Moment
hero.desc: An AI-powered occasion management platform that automatically collects dates, generates personalized wishes, designs greeting cards, and sends them from your own accounts.

core.title: The Core Idea
core.desc: Combines the power of Google Calendar, Canva, and AI Copywriting into one intelligent system.

collect.title: Auto-Collect Data
collect.desc: Connects with your contacts and calendar to automatically identify birthdays and anniversaries.

voice.title: Voice Input
voice.desc: Simply say 'Add Rahul, my cousin, birthday July 18' and the AI handles the rest.

generate.title: AI Wish Generator
generate.desc: Generates unique, context-aware wishes based on relationship and tone. No more generic messages.

design.title: Template Designer
design.desc: AI automatically designs beautiful cards, overlaying text and adjusting layouts instantly.

send.title: Smart Sending
send.desc: Sends wishes via WhatsApp, Email, or SMS using your own credentials for a personal touch.

agent.title: Research Agent
agent.desc: Intelligently searches for missing data and suggests hints to keep your calendar complete.
